title: Okay so this whole #calexit bs is actually legit
body:
I cant believe this shit. Lets just assume they do go through it. Dont they realize that it will just led to another civil war. I mean after the civil war it was specifically made illegal to attempt to secede. It is 100% treason. 

I mean so many people died to keep this country united. Why the fuck are they fighting to undo everything we have fought for. 

also for anyone who is interested here is their website: http://www.yescalifornia.org/
